import React from 'react'; let Users = (props) => { props.setUsers( [ { id: 1, followed: true, location: {city: 'Smolensk', country: 'Russia'}, fullName: 'Ulya', avatar: 'https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn%3AANd9GcQrnHsHJ875K2DcaOlSvGPmv86g5kdZiiAXQQ&usqp=CAU' }, { id: 2, followed: true, location: {city: 'Smolensk', country: 'Russia'}, fullName: 'Mama', avatar: 'https://sun9-55.userapi.com/impf/0rsrpoqwHtmb90vTX-QCCsE1Hrj9IuCEF75FjQ/UxSgfyJ0PJM.jpg?size=200x0&quality=90&crop=0,1,742,742&sign=55c05187279ddb98125702177a68dc04&ava=1' }, { id: 3, followed: false, location: {city: 'Dvor', country: 'Smolensk'}, fullName: 'Ptichky', avatar: 'https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn%3AANd9GcStQFXMUCoVnK8AyFWMv-xZw8oeweJ_nvOdjA&usqp=CAU' }, { id: 4, followed: true, location: {city: 'Dvor', country: 'Smolensk'}, fullName: 'Tejta', avatar: 'https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn%3AANd9GcTBJRVH7DC3pw_t57B9Ccs8Ilt_DMHyFvx2VQ&usqp=CAU' }, ] ) return
{ props.users.map( u =>
{ u.followed? : }
{u.fullName}
{u.location.country}
{u.location.city}
) }
} export default Users;
